original_text: And Reuben went in the days of wheat harvest, and found mandrakes in the field, and brought them unto his mother Leah. Then Rachel said to Leah, Give me, I pray thee, of thy son's mandrakes.
korean_text: 밀 거둘 때 르우벤이 나가서 들에서 합환채를 얻어 그의 어머니 레아에게 드렸더니 라헬이 레아에게 이르되 언니의 아들의 합환채를 청구하노라

sentences.original_text: And Reuben went in the days of wheat harvest
and found mandrakes in the field
and brought them unto his mother Leah
Give me, I pray thee, of thy son's mandrakes
